radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild bibasilar atelectasis, severe inflammation in the right lower quadrant centered about the appendix which is dilated to 12 mm, adjacent tiny locules of extraluminal gas, 1.5 cm simple cyst in the upper pole of the left kidney, 1.3 cm simple cyst in the lower pole of the left kidney, small hiatal hernia, kidneys are atrophic, pancreas is severely atrophic, no mesenteric or retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy, infrarenal aorta mildly dilated to 3.1 cm, 5.2 x 3.8 cm enlarged prostate.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Infrarenal aorta mildly dilated to 3.1 cm not significantly changed since CT of ___.
